turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi Assistant, i'd like to order coffee from starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hello (name), From which location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I will order from the Weston Florida Starbucks

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Confirmed, what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please order me a Black and White Mocha

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Please give me the Grande size

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of milk would you like used?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like the 2% MIlk used

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What type of Cream would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like it whipped cream

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to order anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like to add a tip?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will this complete your order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, complete my order

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: As soon as possible, please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Confirmed - Black and White Mocha Grande size with 2% Milk and Whipped cream at Weston Starbucks Florida in 15 minutes

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you, goodbye little homie.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: goodbye.
